file_content.text: Go. Stop Nefarid for both our sakes.
If you must kill me, at least tell me why.
The Jedi isn't here for you, fool. Not that it matters. No one will escape Lord Nefarid's purge.
You're both dead--just like everyone scrabbling for peace. As the last person marked, Jedi, you'll be first to fall.
Lord Nefarid's plans are unraveling. Hand over the targeting device.
I'm not afraid.
Why wasn't I a target after our first meeting, with Count Alde?
You marked me last?
I assumed the Killiks would eat you. A mistake I've now corrected.
If I'm going to die, I'll make sure you go with me.
I'll still kill you.
Don't expect me to beg for my life. We're past that, now.
If you're hoping to remove that mark on you, don't. I've just rendered the targeting device... non-functional.
Then we've heard enough from you.
Blasted woman has doomed us both... unless we work together.
You have my full cooperation, Duke.
I agree.
If you've got a plan to stop Lord Nefarid, let's hear it.
What do you suggest?
It's simple: Kill him before he kills us.
I don't need help from an Imperial lackey.
What do you mean, "we"?
Correction: an "Imperial lackey" who knows where Lord Nefarid's hiding.
I knew it would be wise to keep tabs on that Sith. Disgusting little men like him are always up to something.
He's using a mountain bunker as a base. I'll give you the coordinates. Kill him if you can.
All I need to destroy is the Death Mark technology.
He isn't my goal.
What defenses should I expect from this base?
Do you know anything else?
The bunker repels torpedo bombers--and that's just the outside. Your work's cut out for you.
Should've known "working together" meant I'd take all the risk.
Some help you are.
I daresay you're better equipped to face a Sith than I am.
I'm leaving for the spaceport. I'll try to outrun the Death Mark in case you fail. But first, this traitor dies.
If you want peace on Alderaan, you must realize death isn't justice.
Don't kill her.
I'll put her in a detention cell until she can be tried and executed.
Wait. She may have valuable information.
Question her, first.
I hope I live long enough to question her personally.
My only regret is you knocked her unconscious.
Allow me. [Kill Aleyna.]
Quick and painless. Much better than she deserved.
And the Jedi Council worries about me going to the dark side....
Killing unconscious prisoner = against Jedi Code // Jedi = needs counseling
I don't know you. Keep your distance.
